content: अवरुध् {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To obstruct, hinder, stop, prevent, detain; मा गा इत्यवरुद्धया <ls>Ś. 2. 2.</ls> {@--2@} To shut up, besiege; अवरोधि गौर्गौपेन; अवारुद्ध गौः; ( स्वयमेव) <ls>P. III. 1. 64</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls>; so पुरमवारुणत्; to confine, lock up (<ab>oft.</ab> with two <ab>acc.</ab>); शोकं चित्तनवारुधत् <ls>Bk. 6. 9</ls>; व्रजमवरुणद्धिगां <ls>Sk.</ls>; with <ab>loc.</ab> case also; आत्मानमात्मन्यवरुध्य <ls>Bhāg.</ls> {@--3@} To furnish, supply, procure, obtain (for one), get, attain to; कामं, अन्नं. {@--4@} To suspend; attach oneself.
